url.title: #URL
url.description: The URL of the WFS server.

dataCustodian.title: #Data custodian
dataCustodian.description:
A description of the custodian of the data sources in this group.
This property is an HTML string that must be sanitized before display to the user.

blacklist.title: #Blacklist
blacklist.description:
A hash of names of blacklisted data layers.  A layer that appears in this hash
will not be shown to the user.  In this hash, the keys should be the Title of the layers to blacklist,
and the values should be "true".

description: A {@link CatalogGroup} representing a collection of feature types from a Web Feature Service (WFS) server.
title: Web Feature Service (WFS) Server
